# MapboxProblem

Source code for problem with fragments containing MapView

**Platform:** Android API 17

**Mapbox SDK version:** com.mapbox.mapboxsdk:mapbox-android-sdk:5.1.2@aar

App crash, when android deconstructs map resources. So this is happening, when:
- Replace fragment with map with another one
- Try detach fragment with map, atached to activity
- Close activity with the map

**Tested:** Android Emulator with Android 4.2 (Google APis), Htc Sensation (Android 4.2.2), Sony Xperia Lt26I(Android 4.1.2)
On every device, tested both apps: my sample, and you Mapbox Demo app (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mapbox.mapboxandroiddemo&hl=pl)

### Steps to trigger behavior
In my sample: 
1. Create two fragment instances of SupportMapFragment.
2. Replace one fragment with other

In your Mapbox Demo app:
1. Open app
2. Click "A simple map view"
3. Press back button
App restarts and in logac shows error.

Problem occurs only when < Android API 18

### Expected behavior
Map deconstructed without an error

### Actual behavior
App crash, logcat shows
In my sample:
